name: PrepareOrderForCheckout
description:
Prepare the order to go into the checkout

If the order still has status ShoppingCart, update it to Order and:
 - Validate lineactiontypes (customer are not allowed to use ShipLine p/a)
 - Set the SoldBy on the lines to the current user
 - Set the addresses of the customer on the order, if not already set
 - (Re)calculate the taxes
 - Recalculate the order: discounts, shippingcosts, giftwrappingcosts etc.
